title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, West]
description: The road rises on a long slope up a hill to the north and northwest, and meanders southeast toward the banks of a swiftly moving river.  At the top of the hill can be seen the dark silhouette of a short, squat tower topped with a domed roof.

The road rises on a long slope up a hill to the north and northwest, and meanders southeast toward the banks of a swiftly moving river.  At the top of the hill rests a short squat tower topped with a white quartz dome that sparkles faintly in the sun.
